resources.string:
Raj Kukadia 
 kukadia.r@husky.neu.edu 
 1st year M.S 
 Telecommunication Systems Management

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

string.name: ack_details_label_one
string.p:
> I have loaded the entire dictionary in a hashmap in string format using put(); method and fetching using get(key); method. 
 
> I have loaded the dictionary in the Main Activity itself so that the app runs smoother from there on. I am going to try to load my dictionary on another thread. 

 > Also, I am working on encoding the dictionary to binary files.

string.name: ack_details_label_two
string.p:
Code for TicTacToe: Hello, Android text by Ed Burnette 
 
 Code for requesting run time permission: https://developer.android.com/training/permissions/requesting.html 
 
 App icon: Google Images
